pages.text: Harvestmen are arachnids characterized by a smalled elliptical body and eight long legs, that extend from its fused body. They have a single pair of eyes in the middle of the cephalothorax. They are non venomous carnivorous animals.
$(l)Eats:$() N/A$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() N/A$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Wood/Moss Egg (Small)$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Egg Collection Phial
